Generate flextable for preview first page

Source: R/to_slides.R
slides_preview.Rd

Generate flextable for preview first page

slides_preview(x)

Arguments

x

rtables or data.frame

Examples

# Example 1. preview table
library(dplyr)
adsl <- eg_adsl
t_dm_slide(adsl, "TRT01P", c("SEX", "AGE")) %>% slides_preview()
